remarks: The domain of the Cantor normal form function (in later lemmas we will use ` dom ( A CNF B ) ` to abbreviate "the set of finitely supported functions from ` B ` to ` A ` ").  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jun-2019.)
statement:
cantnffval.s $e |- S = { g e. ( A ^m B ) | g finSupp (/) } $.
cantnffval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnffval.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfdm $p |- ( ph -> dom ( A CNF B ) = S ) $.
$d A g $.
$d B g $.
